name: Tactical Sneeze
description:
The human race is being threatened by aliens as they have landed on our planet and have started introducing their fauna. 

This caused an allergic reaction in all humans, as long as they are close enough to the alien plants they will sneeze uncontrollably every 10 seconds.

 Your mission is to infiltrate the alien spaceship and discover the cure for the never-ending sneezing.

Good Luck!

Controls:

WASD - move around

Ctrl- crouch

Right Click - look around the corner to the right

Left Click - look around the corner to the left

Alt+F4 - to exit
